item.title: 👎Dan Steele - WA Assn of School Administrators & WA Assn of School Business Officials
item.description: Dan Steele signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA Assn of School Administrators & WA Assn of School Business Officials.

item.title: 👍💵Julie Salvi - Washington Education Association
item.description: Julie Salvi signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Education Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
